titles.title: Cold War Medal Act of 2007
A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the award of a military service medal to members of the Armed Forces who served honorably during the Cold War era.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 7/11/2007--Introduced. Cold War Medal Act of 2007 - Directs the Secretary of the military department concerned, upon application, to issue Cold War service medals to military personnel who served honorably during the Cold War era (September 2, 1945, through December 26, 1991).
